speaker: TALBOT
text:
My
               
              gracious
               
              prince
               
              and
               
              honorable
               
              peers
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Hearing
               
              of
               
              your
               
              arrival
               
              in
               
              this
               
              realm
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
I
               
              have
               
              awhile
               
              given
               
              truce
               
              unto
               
              my
               
              wars

speaker: TALBOT
text:
To
               
              do
               
              my
               
              duty
               
              to
               
              my
               
              sovereign
              ;

speaker: TALBOT
text:
In
               
              sign
               
              whereof
              ,
               
              this
               
              arm
              ,
               
              that
               
              hath
               
              reclaimed

speaker: TALBOT
text:
To
               
              your
               
              obedience
               
              fifty
               
              fortresses
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Twelve
               
              cities
              ,
               
              and
               
              seven
               
              walled
               
              towns
               
              of
               
              strength
              ,

text:
Besides
               
              five
               
              hundred
               
              prisoners
               
              of
               
              esteem
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Lets
               
              fall
               
              his

              before
               
              your
               
              Highness’
               
              feet
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              with
               
              submissive
               
              loyalty
               
              of
               
              heart

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Ascribes
               
              the
               
              glory
               
              of
               
              his
               
              conquest
               
              got

speaker: TALBOT
text:
First
               
              to
               
              my
               
              God
              ,
               
              and
               
              next
               
              unto
               
              your
               
              Grace
              .

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Is
               
              this
               
              the
               
              Lord
               
              Talbot
              ,
               
              Uncle

              ,

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
That
               
              hath
               
              so

              resident
               
              in
               
              France
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Yes
              ,
               
              if
               
              it
               
              please
               
              your
               
              Majesty
              ,
               
              my
               
              liege
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Welcome
              ,
               
              brave
               
              captain
               
              and
               
              victorious
               
              lord
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
When
               
              I
               
              was
               
              young
              —
              as
               
              yet
               
              I
               
              am
               
              not
               
              old
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              do
               
              remember
               
              how
               
              my
               
              father
               
              said

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
A
               
              stouter
               
              champion
               
              never
               
              handled
               
              sword
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Long
               
              since
               
              we
               
              were
               
              resolvèd
               
              of
               
              your
               
              truth
              ,

KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Your
               
              faithful
               
              service
              ,

              your

              in
               
              war

KING
               
              HENRY

Yet

Or

Because

Therefore

              ;

              for

              HENRY

We
               
              here

text:
Now
              ,

              to

              that

              at
               
              sea

Disgracing
               
              of
               
              these
               
              colors
               
              that

The

Against

text:
